short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Omnistudio Add-ons enable comparison and search across Omniscript, VIP, Flexcards, Lightning web components, and Apex

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Major Features:*

1. Supports comparison between different Omniscripts, Integration Procedures, Flexcards, DataMappers, Lightning Web Components and Apex within same or different orgs.

2. Quick search with in Omnistudio elements and Data JSON that results in faster debugging/reviewing and overall development time. The search can be done in general or with filter by Type, Name and the Configurations.

3. Reference finder allows searching reference of omnistudio components, LWC, Apex files in other components.

4. SOQL Builder helps building quick forming of query and executing the same.

Note: Works across multiple namespaces (insurance, cmt, public sector, omnistudio etc), supports both standard and managed package.

*Documentation:* <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dw2bBV7GIcy97NTWG5psW-vKK1Q9_Dr4v2HSxx9lGrM/edit?usp=sharing>

*Video Tutorial:* <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XKkdtuvVhtURs8ReB6FGxj436o6zel8X/view>
